  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super_admin'::text]))))) AND (((access_level)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['public'::character varying, 'admin'::character varying])::text[])) OR (((access_level)::text = 'super_admin'::text) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'super_admin'::text)))))))

policies.qual:
((bucket_id = 'chat-files'::text) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = ANY (ARRAY['admin'::text, 'super_admin'::text]))))))

policies.policyname: Users can delete their own chat files
policies.qual: ((bucket_id = 'chat-files'::text) AND ((auth.uid())::text = (storage.foldername(name))[1]))

policies.policyname: Users can view chat files they have access to
policies.qual:
((bucket_id = 'chat-files'::text) AND (auth.uid() IS NOT NULL) AND (((auth.uid())::text = (storage.foldername(name))[1]) OR (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM chat_sessions cs
  WHERE (((cs.id)::text = (storage.foldername(objects.name))[2]) AND (auth.uid() = ANY (cs.participants)))))))
